author: Martin-Grunewald
body:
Multi-threading for some HLTcore plugins:
HLTEventAnalyzerAOD.h
HLTEventAnalyzerRAW.h
TriggerSummaryAnalyzerAOD.h
TriggerSummaryAnalyzerRAW.h
and
TriggerSummaryProducerRAW.h
Still missing: more complicated TriggerSummaryProducerAOD.h as it needs a non-trivial GlobalCache
title: Multi-threading for some HLTcore plugins
